channel.title: Just a few problems(DELTA)!
channel.description: 1.How do i make a control panel?Very very important 2.How do i make an npc saying 'Owner harry is offline' and another saying 'Co-owner Tornado66111 is offline'(obv if they r online,it says online)Im thinking its sumin 2 do with 'vent' maybe? 3. When people r muted,they can still yell,how can i change this? 4.anyone got any ideas for a good hightrain which isnt automatically agressive? 5.I found this,i want my server to look like this upon login,anyway how? http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/626/capturel.png 6.I need it to greet new players when they first login 7.I need it to yell when anyone logs in

Thanks,the yell thing worked

item.title: Just a few problems(DELTA)!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

1.How do i make a control panel?Very very important
2.How do i make an npc saying ‘Owner harry is offline’ and another saying ‘Co-owner Tornado66111 is offline’(obv if they r online,it says online)Im thinking its sumin 2 do with ‘vent’ maybe?
3. When people r muted,they can still yell,how can i change this?
4.anyone got any ideas for a good hightrain which isnt automatically agressive?
5.I found this,i want my server to look like this upon login,anyway how?
http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/626/capturel.png
6.I need it to greet new players when they first login
7.I need it to yell when anyone logs in
